channel.title: I closed my run now my server wont let me connect and says its offline!?
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Ok so i have pictures to support me every thing was working good until like 5 hours ago then it went offline after i closed it to compile so my work saves. Ive been trying to find out what happened for about 5 hours this is my "run" It looks normal to me but then again i dont know much about this...[/size] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/919qmt.jpg[/img]
When i try to log in it says Error connected to server.
I really just want to continue coding!!!
And yes my client is connected to the ip.
[size=36pt]It does this for every source!?!?[/size]

item.title: I closed my run now my server wont let me connect and says its offline!?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Elux, post:7, topic:448318”][quote author=iLL Scape link=topic=551209.msg4039471#msg4039471 date=1341462995]
I had to re port-forward because I blew a fuse where my router is.
[/quote]

People need to quit local-hosting and invest 20 quid in a proper server. You can get them from cheap these days.[/quote]
Not everybody has money to be spending on private servers.

Read full topic
